title: YOOO HELP QUICK ITS RLLY FKG IMPORTANT I CANT DO THAT ANYMORE!!!!!!!!
body: OK so i just want to change my DAMMMMM EMAIL FOR ANOTHER 1 BUTTT NOOOO. INVALID SHITTY TOKEN. WHEN I DID IT AND IM TRYING SO MANY TIME IM TILTED AND I CANT GET THE DAMM EMAIL TO SEE IF I CAN GO TO PBE SOOO I NEED SOMEONE WHO WORKS HERE AND HELP ME OUT QUICKLY I HAVE A YOUTUBE CHANNEL ITS IMPORTANT

replies.body:
First of all, you need to calm down and stop raging. That won't help you for sure.

Second of all, if its invalid token then maybe try again? Look closer? Check if you didn't miss any capital letters? Or just try on different browser, that helps sometimes.

Since you're having issues with this and a different browser didn't resolve this, I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as *Hyperion3182* suggested.

One of our specialists will be able to assist you with this. Let me know if you have any questions.
Then, send a request to player Support and explain precisely the whole issue.

Stop trying too much and relax, please have a look at the FAQ:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744-Email-Verification-FAQ#h4

"If you have requested multiple verification links to your email address, the old email tokens will expire and the latest one you requested will be the only valid token. If you happen to use an expired token, you will receive the "Invalid Email Token" error.

Please look for the latest verification email that you were sent to ensure that you are using the most recent link. Be sure to check your spam folder before requesting for another token."
